nodes.bodyText:
Nits:

Use a block comment instead of single-line comments.
Please create a ticket for updating google services specifically mentioning the cast SDK in it.
Once the ticket is created add an item in its acceptance criteria to revisit this part of code in it.
Also the add the ticket's link to this TODO item.

This won't log the exception to Crashlytics as a non-fatal, you'll have to call the function as follows:
 logger.error(e, true);

This won't log the exception to Crashlytics as a non-fatal, you'll have to call the function as follows:
 logger.error(e, true);
